prompt: FPS-16. The video plays at normal speed. After holding the side profile briefly, he returns his gaze to the front, maintaining steady eye contact while his lips continue their lively motion. The overall atmosphere is charged with quiet intensity, focusing on the athlete’s presence and vocal delivery within a high-stakes competitive environment.
negative_prompt: FPS-16. The video plays in distorted slow motion with unstable speed and jittering frames, exhibiting severe stuttering and frame skips. A male athlete wearing a vibrant red sports jersey with yellow flame patterns and Chinese national insignia appears grotesquely deformed — his face is contorted with deep, unnatural wrinkles, misaligned teeth jutting at odd angles, and eyes sunken or mismatched. His short dark hair is frayed and pixelated, lacking texture or definition. His mouth remains frozen in a single expression, lips unmoving despite attempted speech, creating an eerie disconnect. His right hand is twisted and fragmented — fingers fused or elongated, knuckles reversed, trembling violently as if broken — then snaps abruptly into an unnatural gesture before freezing again. He begins facing forward but lurches erratically sideways with jerky, disjointed head turns, shoulders spasming unnaturally. The background dissolves into a chaotic collage of grainy textures, striped noise patterns, and flickering purple-blue artifacts, devoid of spatial coherence. Lighting is harsh and inconsistent — overexposed highlights clash with pitch-black shadows, creating extreme contrast that flattens depth and bleeds colors. The camera stutters violently, cutting abruptly between unstable angles, zooming in and out erratically, often cropping limbs or faces mid-motion. Composition is unstructured, framing is inconsistent, and every movement feels artificially forced and mechanically broken. The entire scene is rendered as a low-quality, unrealistic 3D animation with extreme sharpness and saturation that only amplifies the visual degradation — grainy, noisy, artifact-ridden, with floating text overlays and logo distortions. No fluidity, no rhythm, no presence — only mechanical failure and visual decay.
